content.text: How do we create a financial model that investors will actually trust?

Base your assumptions on real data and industry benchmarks. Show them you understand your unit economics. Be realistic and transparent. Include best-case, worst-case, and base-case scenarios. What are your key drivers?
What are some common mistakes startups make when managing their finances?

Poor cash flow management, lack of financial planning, and underestimating expenses. Don't forget to account for taxes! Reinvesting everything back into the company and not paying yourself is also a mistake, to some extent.
